column3: ACK, this was introduced by me in fa0ad4e7ce8f4c19fe58bf06747bf8c62600581c
Probably because the previous documentation incorrectly labeled this as "required". See https://bitcoincore.org/en/doc/0.17.0/rpc/blockchain/scantxoutset/
ACK 7d263571bee8c36fbe3c854b69c6f31cf1ee3b9b\nThank you for fixing a clearly defined bug with a clear, minimal change.
